attributes.action: Save the closure of the Maternity unit at Queensmarys Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop the closure of the much needed maternity ward being shut down at Queen Mary NHS Trust's department.

It has 3,000 deliveries a year! where else can that amount go with already over stretched other hospital maternity wards?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the closure of the Maternity unit at Queensmarys Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14697.asp

Prime Minister's Office
